articles.title: England in New Zealand: Judgement day for Bazball is upon us
articles.description: The tour of New Zealand begins a defining year for England under Ben Stokes and Brendon McCullum, writes chief cricket reporter Stephan Shemilt.
articles.content:
In Christchurch, the city of his birth, Stokes is born again. Physically fit and back to his ebullient self. 
As usual, he politely fends off suggestions that this is a homecoming - "I'm English" - … [+1960 chars]

articles.author: James Dampney
articles.title: Umpire’s shock call after gruesome injury
articles.description: The umpire that made global headlines after he was struck by a cricket ball has made a surprise admission about his ordeal.
articles.content:
The umpire that made global headlines after he was struck by a cricket ball has made a surprise admission about his ordeal.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
